attributes.action: Take immediate action so that Londoners of all races are free to go about their daily business without the fear of being mugged, stabbed or shot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent murder of 4 londoners (Turkish,Iranian,Polish, Asian)we demand that londoners of all races are free to go about their daily business without fear of being mugged, stabbed or shot.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
